House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00120
FULL TITLE : AN ACT IMPLEMENTING THE PEOPLE’S RIGHT TO INFORMATION AND THE CONSTITUTIONAL POLICIES OF FULL PUBLIC DISCLOSURE AND HONESTY IN THE PUBLIC SERVICE AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : People’s Freedom Of Information Act
ABSTRACT : Recognizes the right of the people to information on matters of public concern and adopts and implements a policy of full public disclosure of all its transactions involving the public interest, subject to the procedures and limitation provided by this Act.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, ANGELINA "HELEN" D.L. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC INFORMATION ON 2016-07-26
